citizen_protection_statement.de: WINDI bewertet keine Menschen. WINDI entscheidet keine Leistungen. WINDI ersetzt keine Sachbearbeiter. WINDI dokumentiert Prozesse, garantiert Nachvollziehbarkeit und schützt sowohl Bürger als auch Mitarbeiter.
citizen_protection_statement.en: WINDI does not evaluate people. WINDI does not decide benefits. WINDI does not replace caseworkers. WINDI documents processes, guarantees traceability, and protects both citizens and employees.
citizen_protection_statement.pt: WINDI não avalia pessoas. WINDI não decide benefícios. WINDI não substitui funcionários. WINDI documenta processos, garante rastreabilidade e protege tanto cidadãos quanto funcionários.
